resource_explanation: El Plano group's invites API. Invite attributes : - `email` - Represents email where invite was sent. - `invitation_token` - Represents token. - `status` - Represents invite current status. - `accepted` - The invite was accepted by the recipient. - `pending` - The invite was not accepted by the recipient. Default status. - `sent_at` - Date and time when the invite was sent. - `accepted_at` - Date and time when the invite was accepted by recipient. - `timestamps` Also, includes reference to the sender, recipient. NOTE : This endpoint allowed only for the group owner user.
description: SHOW : Retrieve information about requested invite
explanation: Returns a single instance of the invite.

requests.curl:
curl -g "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/group/invites/2" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer e1e99c563d8614c82f74db36cc9792e2833e9b2f7b62658c7012d5aee908d87a" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
